com.bluegosling.concurrent

Class ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluegosling.concurrent.WrappingExecutor
      • com.bluegosling.concurrent.WrappingExecutorService
        • com.bluegosling.concurrent.ContextPropagatingExecutorService
          • com.bluegosling.concurrent.ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableExecutorService, ListenableScheduledExecutorService, Executor, ExecutorService, ScheduledExecutorService

    public class ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService
extends ContextPropagatingExecutorService
implements ListenableScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that allows for propagation of context from submitting threads to worker threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService(ScheduledExecutorService delegate, Iterable<ContextPropagator<?>> propagators)
      Constructs a new context propagating scheduled executor service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService

        public ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService(ScheduledExecutorService delegate,
                                                  Iterable<ContextPropagator<?>> propagators)
        Constructs a new context propagating scheduled executor service.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the underlying scheduled executor service, for executing and scheduling tasks
        propagators - objects that manage and propagate context for each task submission
